DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop test efficacy online HIV risk reduction intervention among men sex men .
DOC.brief_title: Novel Internet-Based Interventions Reduce Sexual Risk Among Men Who Have Sex With Men
DOC.detailed_description: This Internet-based , five-branch randomize control intervention , enrol 3,000 adult MSM . The five branch include 1 ) control condition receive intervention content , 2 ) standard text-based prevention webpage , 3 ) 8 minute dramatic video address sexual risk reduction within context alcohol use , 4 ) 5 minute documentary video address HIV disclosure , HIV testing , condom use sub-context drug use , 5 ) video . After complete baseline survey , eligible participant consent participate intervention randomly assign control condition one four intervention condition . The control condition include delivery intervention content . All participant ( branch 1-5 ) ask complete brief post-intervention survey ( measure intention ) . All intervention participant invite complete final 60-day follow-up survey .
DOC.criteria: Male ; Age 18 ; Ability read respond English ; Reside within United States ; Report oral anal sex male ( new partner ) past 60 day AND report oral , anal vaginal sex first time partner ( male female ) past 60 day ; Complete baseline survey Provide email address ; Women transgender person
